description: Detects execution of shells from a parent process located in a temporary (/tmp) directory
author: Joseliyo Sanchez
@Joseliyo_Jstnk
name: Shell Execution Of Process Located In Tmp Directory
query: (process.parent.executable:/\/[Tt][Mm][Pp]\/.*/ AND process.executable:(/.*\/[Bb][Aa][Ss][Hh]/ OR /.*\/[Cc][Ss][Hh]/ OR /.*\/[Dd][Aa][Ss][Hh]/ OR /.*\/[Ff][Ii][Ss][Hh]/ OR /.*\/[Kk][Ss][Hh]/ OR /.*\/[Ss][Hh]/ OR /.*\/[Zz][Ss][Hh]/))
